banner.title: Your Privacy Matters
banner.description: We use cookies and analytics tools to improve your experience. You can customize your preferences or accept all.
banner.customizeAriaLabel: Open cookie settings to customize preferences
banner.screenReaderAnnouncement: Cookie consent banner is displayed. Please make a choice to continue.

modal.title: Privacy Settings
modal.description: Manage your consent preferences. Your choices are saved and can be changed at any time. Policy version:

essential.title: Essential
essential.description: Required for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled as they are necessary for core functionality like navigation and security.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Helps us understand how visitors interact with our website. We use Vercel Analytics, which is cookie-free and GDPR-compliant. No personal data is collected.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Allows us to monitor and improve website performance, loading times, and user experience through aggregated metrics.

settings.title: Consent Settings
settings.description: Manage your privacy and cookie preferences. You have full control over what data we collect.
settings.noConsentYet: You have not made any consent decisions yet. Please configure your preferences below.

gdprRights.title: You have the following rights
gdprRights.access: Right to access your personal data (Art. 15 GDPR)
gdprRights.rectification: Right to rectification of inaccurate data (Art. 16 GDPR)
gdprRights.erasure: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten', Art. 17 GDPR)
gdprRights.restriction: Right to restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR)
gdprRights.objection: Right to object to processing (Art. 21 GDPR)

settings.contactText: To exercise your rights, contact us at:
